column1: 1. What is your role in the company?
column2: 2. Do you have people  reporting to you?
column3: 3. How many years have you worked in the company?
column4: 4. Number of years the Company has been in operation?
column5: 5. Which countries do you export to
column7: 7. Which Product Labels (Designers/Buyers are you currently producing / have produced recently?

column9: The company has adequately invested in technology systems
column10: We rely on the buyer/designer to provide the PLM system
column11: We are well trained on how to use the PLM systems
column12: We use the PLM Product lifecycle management system in all our orders
column13: PLM systems support to improve our target delivery
column14: The company has a system to measure our productivity
column15: The company communicates on expected targets (Line output) to be delivered
column16: The company maintains a productivity dashboard
column17: We are awarded on basis of productivity performance
column18: We are preferred by most designers due to our capacity
column19: We can understand and interpret system instructions from designers accurately
column20: Authorization of supplies and processes is done in the system
column21: Tracking of orders in production is done in the system
column22: Inventory management (Store keeping) is done in the system
column23: Shipping management is done in the system
column24: We usually meet our production targets
column25: Tech designs provided in the PLM are usually standard
column26: Our team is divided into tasks as per processes defined in the PLM
column27: The designer firms have dedicated team for each process we handle
column28: We have dedicated staff that handle correspondence with the buyer/designer in the system
column29: We usually get timely responses facilitated by PLM
column30: The designer/buyer expects information in specific format or standard templates
column31: Different buyers/designers have different processes of production that significantly vary
column32: Styles and seasonal orders from the same designer/buyer significantly vary
column33: PLM tools used by different designers/ buyers significantly vary
column34: Production accuracy (good QA report) is significantly improved by using PLM tools.
column35: We have machines for Cut & Make in production
column36: We have machines for garment finishing
column37: We have machines for tagging and packaging
column39: Our Machines require very few operators
column40: Machine operators and technical staff are mostly locally sourced
column41: We do not usually have to input data into our systems as it is automatically collected
column42: We have reduced fabric off cuts due to Machine Cut & Make
column43: We rarely get Cancelled samples due to quality finishing
column44: Our Machines are usually busy minimal idle time

column7: the labels depend on the buyer.we have variety of buyers hence labels.
